result.eng: Do you have enough milk there?
result.ga: an bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansin
result.orig: An bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansin
result.html: an bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansinDo you have enough milk there?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil ḃur ndóṫain bainne ansinDo you have enough milk there?

result.eng: Would you like to go there?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat dul ansin
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat dul ansin
result.html: ar mhaith leat dul ansinWould you like to go there?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat dul ansinWould you like to go there?

result.eng: Slim chance she will find anything there.
result.ga: beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.orig: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.html: beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.
result.ponchtml: beag an baol go n-aimseoiḋ sí rud ar biṫ ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.

result.eng: What happened then?
result.ga: cad a tharla ansin
result.orig: Cad a tharla ansin
result.html: cad a tharla ansinWhat happened then?
result.ponchtml: cad a ṫarla ansinWhat happened then?

result.eng: What's going on back there?
result.ga: cad atá ar siúl thiar ansin
result.orig: Cad atá ar siúl thiar ansin
result.html: cad atá ar siúl thiar ansinWhat's going on back there?
result.ponchtml: cad atá ar siúl ṫiar ansinWhat's going on back there?

result.eng: I spent three years over there.
result.ga: chaith mé trí bliana thall ansin
result.orig: Chaith mé trí bliana thall ansin
result.html: chaith mé trí bliana thall ansinI spent three years over there.
result.ponchtml: ċaiṫ mé trí bliana ṫall ansinI spent three years over there.

result.eng: There is a leaflet there.
result.ga: tá bileog ansin
result.orig: Tá bileog ansin
result.html: tá bileog ansinThere is a leaflet there.
result.ponchtml: tá bileog ansinThere is a leaflet there.

result.eng: Sit down over there.
result.ga: suigh síos ansin
result.orig: Suigh síos ansin
result.html: suigh síos ansinSit down over there.
result.ponchtml: suiġ síos ansinSit down over there.

result.eng: There is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.
result.ga: tá bileog ansin tá an t-eolas ar fad ann
result.orig: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad ann
result.html: tá bileog ansin tá an t-eolas ar fad annThere is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.
result.ponchtml: tá bileog ansin tá an t-eolas ar fad annThere is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.

result.eng: There is a chair there.
result.ga: tá cathaoir ansin
result.orig: Tá cathaoir ansin
result.html: tá cathaoir ansinThere is a chair there.
result.ponchtml: tá caṫaoir ansinThere is a chair there.

result.eng: I have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.
result.ga: tá beirt agamsa anseo mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon siubhán
result.orig: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon Siubhán
result.html: tá beirt agamsa anseo mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon siubhánI have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.
result.ponchtml: tá beirt agamsa anseo míċeál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon siuḃánI have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.

result.eng: I will see what is happening there, excuse me.
result.ga: feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal
result.orig: Feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal
result.html: feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.
result.ponchtml: feicfiḋ mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gaḃ mo leiṫscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.

result.eng: It is there on the left.
result.ga: tá sé ansin ar chlé
result.orig: Tá sé ansin ar chlé
result.html: tá sé ansin ar chléIt is there on the left.
result.ponchtml: tá sé ansin ar ċléIt is there on the left.

result.eng: It is there on the right.
result.ga: tá sé ansin ar dheis
result.orig: Tá sé ansin ar dheis
result.html: tá sé ansin ar dheisIt is there on the right.
result.ponchtml: tá sé ansin ar ḋeisIt is there on the right.

result.eng: They have the best traditional music there.
result.ga: bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den chéad scoth acu ansin
result.orig: Bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den chéad scoth acu ansin
result.html: bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den chéad scoth acu ansinThey have the best traditional music there.
result.ponchtml: bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den ċéad scoṫ acu ansinThey have the best traditional music there.

result.eng: Go down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ga: téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar shráid na gceannaithe
result.orig: Téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar Shráid na gCeannaithe
result.html: téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar shráid na gceannaitheGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ponchtml: téigí síos an bóṫar sin agus feicfiḋ siḃ stad na mbusanna ansin ar ẛráid na gceannaiṫeGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.

result.eng: I have a bad pain there.
result.ga: tá drochphian orm ansin
result.orig: Tá drochphian orm ansin
result.html: tá drochphian orm ansinI have a bad pain there.
result.ponchtml: tá droċṗian orm ansinI have a bad pain there.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ga: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.orig: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.html: sin Úna sin niamh ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireadh[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ponchtml: sin Úna sin niaṁ ansin muiris tá seisean i lár báire ansin fiona agus mise ar deireaḋ[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.

result.eng: Are you there?
result.ga: an bhfuil tú ansin
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ansin
result.html: an bhfuil tú ansinAre you there?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil tú ansinAre you there?

result.eng: Do you go there together?
result.ga: an dtéann sibh ansin le chéile
result.orig: An dtéann sibh ansin le chéile
result.html: an dtéann sibh ansin le chéileDo you go there together?
result.ponchtml: an dtéann siḃ ansin le ċéileDo you go there together?

result.eng: I live in Cork now. - I live there as well!
result.ga: tá mé i mo chónaí i gcorcaigh anois - tá mise i mo chónaí ansin freisin
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí i gCorcaigh anois - Tá mise i mo chónaí ansin freisin
result.html: tá mé i mo chónaí i gcorcaigh anois - tá mise i mo chónaí ansin freisinI live in Cork now. - I live there as well!
result.ponchtml: tá mé i mo ċónaí i gcorcaiġ anois - tá mise i mo ċónaí ansin freisinI live in Cork now. - I live there as well!

result.eng: Rome is lovely. I was there last year.
result.ga: tá an róimh go hálainn bhí mé ansin anuraidh
result.orig: Tá an Róimh go hálainn Bhí mé ansin anuraidh
result.html: tá an róimh go hálainn bhí mé ansin anuraidhRome is lovely. I was there last year.
result.ponchtml: tá an róiṁ go hálainn ḃí mé ansin anuraiḋRome is lovely. I was there last year.

result.eng: There are good facilities there, then. - Yes. I'm very happy there.
result.ga: tá áiseanna maithe ann mar sin - tá tá mé an-sásta ansin
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann mar sin - Tá Tá mé an-sásta ansin
result.html: tá áiseanna maithe ann mar sin - tá tá mé an-sásta ansinThere are good facilities there, then. - Yes. I'm very happy there.
result.ponchtml: tá áiseanna maiṫe ann mar sin - tá tá mé an-sásta ansinThere are good facilities there, then. - Yes. I'm very happy there.

result.eng: Do you go there often?
result.ga: an dtéann tú ansin go minic
result.orig: An dtéann tú ansin go minic
result.html: an dtéann tú ansin go minicDo you go there often?
result.ponchtml: an dtéann tú ansin go minicDo you go there often?

result.eng: We've been there for two years now.
result.ga: táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anois
result.orig: Táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anois
result.html: táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anoisWe've been there for two years now.
result.ponchtml: táimid ansin le ḋá ḃliain anoisWe've been there for two years now.

result.eng: I love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.
result.ga: is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maith
result.orig: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maith
result.html: is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maithI love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.
result.ponchtml: is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a ḃíonn an aimsir go maiṫI love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.

result.eng: I will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ga: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.html: beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ a ḟios agam ansin an ḃfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i nua-eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i nua-eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: Then he realized he shouldn't have said that.
result.ga: ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aige
result.orig: Ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aige
result.html: ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aigeThen he realized he shouldn't have said that.
result.ponchtml: ansin smaoiniġ sé naċ raiḃ sin inráite aigeThen he realized he shouldn't have said that.
